items.title: What’s New with Location and Bluetooth APIs on iOS 13
items.description:
With the recently announced iOS 13, we see that Apple’s approach to location privacy is getting more and more serious. This new update will include recurring notifications for users to see whether the app uses their location in the background or not, allowing them to adjust the setting regularly.

items.title: Integrating Braintree with Xamarin Forms
items.description:
In this article, Rendy shows you how to add Braintree client-side integration in a Xamarin Forms app.

For those not familiar with Braintree:

Braintree Payment Gateway is a simple and modern way to accept payments. Along with its list of flexible features, it provides the ability to merchants to accept payments online or within a mobile application.

Braintree integration in Xamarin Forms (Part.1 ) by Rendy

items.title: Google Login Integration in Xamarin Forms: A Complete Guide
items.description:
Login is very common but so is having to remember a load of passwords and usernames. For this reason, it is becoming more and more common that we can log in to apps with existing accounts from social media. One of my most common accounts I use is Google. This shows you how to do it!
